sentence: In his recent State of the Union address, Biden pushed back against a central slogan of the left with a call to fund the police!? How much more money could they possibly need?? asked Elzie, who first became politically active after the police shooting of Michael Brown in her hometown of Ferguson, Mo., in 2014. More training, blah blah blah.
author: Niall Stanage
title: The Memo: Democrats pin hopes on Ketanji Brown Jackson to revive Black support
